Name: classid
Description: The OID of the system catalog the dependent object is\n in

Name: objid
Description: The OID of the specific dependent object

Name: objsubid
Description: For a table column, this is the column number (the\n objid and classid refer to the table itself). For all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: refclassid
Description: The OID of the system catalog the referenced object\n is in

Name: refobjid
Description: The OID of the specific referenced object

Name: refobjsubid
Description: For a table column, this is the column number (the\n refobjid and refclassid refer to the table itself). For all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: deptype
Description: A code defining the specific semantics of this\n dependency relationship; see text.
